name: Cango, Inc.
description: Cango, Inc. is a leading automotive transaction service platform in China, focused on providing a comprehensive suite of services for car buyers and sellers. Founded in 2000, Cango facilitates vehicle purchase financing, insurance services, and other value-added services, streamlining the car buying process for consumers. The company leverages advanced technology to connect dealerships and financial institutions, ensuring customers have access to a wide range of financing options tailored to their needs. Cango's innovative platform not only enhances consumer experience but also drives efficiency for dealerships by improving transaction speed and accuracy. With a commitment to customer satisfaction, Cango continuously develops its offerings to meet the evolving demands of the automotive market in China. In recent years, the company has expanded its services to include a broader array of automotive-related financial products, aiming to become a one-stop solution for automotive transactions. Cango's mission is to transform the automotive retail landscape in China by making purchasing vehicles easier and more accessible for all consumers.

seo.meta_title: Cango, Inc. | Automotive Transaction Services in China
seo.meta_description: Explore Cango, Inc., a leading platform for automotive transaction services in China, offering financing, insurance, and value-added services for car buyers and sellers.

faq.question: What services does Cango provide?
faq.answer: Cango provides vehicle purchase financing, insurance services, and various value-added services to facilitate automotive transactions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cango?
faq.answer: Ming Zhang is the CEO of Cango, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Cango headquartered?
faq.answer: Cango is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
